Grammar:   DataElement 4.0
Namespace: shr.test

CodeSystem:     FOO = http://foo.org
CodeSystem:     BOO = http://boo.org
CodeSystem:     ZOO = http://zoo.org

EntryElement: SimpleGroup
Concept:      FOO #bar, BOO #far, ZOO #bear
Description:  "It is a group entry with a code value"
Value:        code
0..1    Simple
0..*    Coded
1..*    Simple2
1..1    other.ns.Thing

Element:        Simple
Value:          string

Element:        Coded
Value:          code

Element:        Simple2
Value:          string
